Registration has not yet opened for the **Young Statisticians Conference 2017**. 

Members of the Statistical Society will receive updates automatically when registration opens. 

If you are not a member and would like to be added to the mailing list for this event, please register your details [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScrtwxu4CRayb7iUTjwX7zQJUarav-D2kOXRV-SVX8LTXmJOA/viewform).
